page.title: 07TREVALYN HALL
page.content: The area around {Trevalyn Hall}used to be a great forest.Some of the trees were cleared to provide an open space; in other words a field.It was in this field that the family known as{Alla}or {All}established their{'ton'}(this means settlement).The word {ing}meant 'family' and so the name{Allington}was formed meaning the settlement of the{ 'All(a)' family. The word {Trevalyn}is the Welsh word for{Allington.} Sir John Trevor built Trevalyn Hall in 1457 in the reign of Queen Elizabeth II .It was built for lady Trevor Jones to live in.Trevalyn Hall is an E shaped Mansion. Trevalyn Hall has now been converted into three flats where people live. Some people say that there are a few ghost stories around Trevalyn Hall.
